login.welcome: Log in or create a new profile to begin.
login.noPassword: No password is required. Your data is saved in this browser.
login.usernameError: Username must be at least 3 characters long.

settings.title: Settings
settings.layoutDensityDesc: Adjust the layout density to fit your screen size and preference.
settings.aiConfigDesc: Customize the instructions sent to the AI to enhance reports.
settings.baseInstructionDesc: The main role and goal for the AI to adopt.
settings.formattingRulesDesc: Rules for correcting errors, punctuation, and text formatting.
settings.styleAndToneDesc: Guidelines for terminology, how to report logical errors, and summarization.
settings.oncologyAnalysisGeneralDesc: How the AI should handle measurements, medical scales, and clinical context.
settings.recistAnalysisDesc: Enable for the AI to automatically identify lesions, calculate SLD, and assess treatment response.
settings.tnmClassificationDesc: Enable for the AI to add preliminary TNM classification and NCCN guideline suggestions to the conclusions.
settings.conclusionStructureDesc: The format for generating final conclusions and recommendations.
settings.vocabManagementDesc: Import pre-made term sets, add your own from a file, or export your list as a backup.
settings.importNoNew: All default radiology terms are already on the list.
settings.importFromFileSuccess: Imported {{count}} new terms from the file.
settings.importFromFileNoNew: No new terms to import. All terms from the file are already on the list.
settings.customCommandsDesc: Define spoken commands that will be replaced with text. Ideal for shortcuts, symbols, or difficult words.
settings.hotkeysDesc: Configure shortcuts to control the app quickly.

hotkeys.modifierRequired: Single key shortcuts are disabled for safety. Please use Ctrl, Alt, or Shift.

settings.dataManagementDesc: Import or export your templates and vocabulary.
settings.importTemplatesNoNew: No new templates imported. All templates from file already exist.
settings.importTemplatesError: Error importing templates. Check file format.

editor.placeholder: Select a template or start dictating...
editor.micError: Your browser does not support the Web Speech API. Try using Chrome or Edge.
editor.micPermissionError: Microphone permission denied. Please allow access in your browser settings.
editor.aiNoContent: The AI returned no content. Please try again.
editor.aiError: An error occurred during AI processing. Please try again.
editor.continuousModeDesc: Continuous mode: automatically resume recording after a pause.
editor.correctionModeDesc: Enable to right-click text to correct transcription and add new commands.

studyTypes.title: Study Types
studyTypes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all associated scenarios and templates.

templates.title: Templates
templates.noTemplatesDesc: Select a different category or click the '+' button to add one.
templates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
templates.deleteScenarioConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete scenario "{{name}}"? This will also delete all associated templates.

templateModal.requiredFields: Title and Study Type are required.

correctionModal.title: AI Enhancement - Suggested Changes
correctionModal.description: Review the changes and decide whether to accept them.

library.title: Interesting Cases Library
library.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to move case for study '{{studyNumber}}' to trash?
library.searchPlaceholder: Search by study number, notes or content...
library.noCasesFoundDesc: Try changing filters or add a new case from the editor.

report.title: Monthly Report
report.noEntriesForPeriod: No studies found for this period.
report.submissionError: Error submitting report. Please try again.
report.errorPersonalInfo: Please complete your personal information first.
report.partialMonthWarningDesc: You are submitting a report before the end of the month. You can resubmit a complete month's report next month.
report.duplicateStudyWarning: ⚠️ This study number has already been submitted by another user
report.duplicateSubmissionBlocked: Cannot submit: Duplicate study numbers detected. Please review entries with warnings.
report.verificationCommentsPlaceholder: Add comments or reasons for rejection...
report.rejectionCommentRequired: Please provide a reason for rejection.
report.noSubmittedReports: You haven't submitted any reports yet.
